name: Picking off the Stragglers in a Weird Unexplained Intergalactic Space War
name_original: Picking off the Stragglers in a Weird Unexplained Intergalactic Space War
description:
Picking off the Stragglers in a Weird Unexplained Intergalactic Space War (POTSIAWUISW) is a short little mini game made in a little under a week for a Game Programming Design Principles course (this week's focus being the simple factorypattern.) Controls:
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Space to shoot
Credits:
  • Design, Programming, and Art - toadletgames
  • Font - Kiwi Soda by jeti
